title: Immigration Invasion! A Family Affair
description: Russia wants Ukraine backPalestine wants Gaza backChina wants Taiwan backAnd MEXICO wants TEXAS - back!15 million illegal aliens have invaded the US southern border 20,000 single military aged Chinese men have been allowed into the US 2 million Got Aways ... Got away Foreign nationals try to break into US military bases every week Mexico's military has been rebuilt to the largest it has ever been What could possibly go wrong?Can Nick Wolfe save America?
author: Robert Workman
